p: In storage room atmosphere, where savory diffusors at 10% were used, linalool and eucalyptol were the main components at the three sampling times. On the contrary, thymol and carvacrol in chambers showed a significant decrease compared to the pure EO, in fact they were present at 0.14% to 0.63% for carvacrol and at 0.17% to 0.60% for thymol at the beginning and at the end of the trial, respectively.
